title: Burning Arena
description:
The Burning Arena is an ancient 
colliseum that can be found over the Nether.

There are guardians known as Ignited Berserker that may drop Dying Ember on death. Once you have four of them you
will be able to create the Burning Ashes.

You must place this item on the Altar of Fire to summon The Ingis. Finally you will need to defeat it to obtain the Flame Eye.
